QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Watford on Sun, 28 Nov 2021 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Leicester City won 4–2 over Watford on Sun, 28 Nov 2021 14:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Jonny Evans won the most duels (12) in the match.
Tom Cleverley is the most accurate passer (87%) in the match.
Jamie Vardy has the least touches (26) of any outfield player.
Timothy Castagne made an error that led to a goal for Watford.
William Troost-Ekong made an error that led to a goal for Leicester City.
James Maddison was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.3.
Wilfred Ndidi committed a foul leading to a penalty for Watford.
Ademola Lookman is the most fouled player in the match (4 times).
Emmanuel Dennis lost the most duels (13) in the match.
